title: Cross-State Crime Spree (Ed Martin, Lonette Keehner)
description:
An 84-year-old woman bound inside her home. Her husband: missing. And, a manhunt stretching over Montana and Idaho leads investigators to a motel murder.

For episode information and photos, please visit https://anatomyofmurder.com/.
author: content@audiochuck.com (audiochuck)
